content.query:
IF EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'workers_by_fullname'
)
BEGIN
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE workers_by_fullname;
END
GO

-- Ahora s√≠, crear la tabla
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE workers_by_fullname (
    full_name VARCHAR(255),
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(100),
    county VARCHAR(100),
    state CHAR(2),
    zip INT,
    phone1 VARCHAR(20),
    phone2 VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    web VARCHAR(255)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'silver_layer/workers_by_fullname.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = blob_storage,
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat
);
GO

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM workers_by_fullname;
